metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7098 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Race condition in wget 1.17 and earlier, when used in recursive or mirroring mode to download a single file, might allow remote servers to bypass intended access list restrictions by keeping an HTTP connection open.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3').
